channel.title: Music on RIRSC
channel.description: Recent content in Music on RIRSC

item.title: Buch der tage
item.description:
By chance, I discovered the bookshop ‘langer blomqvist’, which is full of discounted and second-hand books. I bought this gem, ‘ Buch der Tage’, by Patti Smith. It consists of a daily photo with a small description covering 2018. Its in German, so I decided it could be cool to force me to read and translate the accordance day.

The one for 12 June says as follows: ‘Lighted candles in memory of the deceases at the Abbey of Saint-Germain-des-Près´.

item.title: Continue the struggle
item.description: Just a blooper from a quick thing for testing the Blender-Unity workflow without exporting to .fbx. Please continue, nothing to see here.

item.title: Flaaryr and the loosers
item.description:
I discovered Flaaryr↗ and his previous band, Hungría↗ His setup is quite nice, make sure to check his social media for a deeper look at the equipment he has to achieve the alien noises he creates.

On Friday we went to SO36 and saw Die Vierlierer, which was quite cool and crowded. The djs afterwards, a couple throwing german 80s postpunk awesonenes were incredibly good.
